description: This is a Python script for a command-line interface (CLI) tool called 'Universal Project Initializer'. It handles project configuration, initialization, and retrieval of run commands for various project types, parsing CLI arguments, and interacting with template and project configuration classes.

classes.name: ProjectConfig
classes.description: Configuration data for a project, including name, version, description, author, type, output path, and parameters.

classes.name: ProjectType
classes.description: Enumeration or class representing different project types, with a method 'from_string' to parse type from string.

classes.name: ProjectInitializer
classes.description: Main class responsible for initializing projects and creating templates.

classes.name: TemplateInitInfo
classes.description: Data structure containing initialization commands and environment info for project templates.

methods.name: parse_parameters
methods.description: Parses a comma-separated string of key=value pairs into a dictionary with appropriate data types.

methods.name: create_project_config
methods.description: Creates a ProjectConfig object from CLI arguments.

methods.name: create_minimal_project_config
methods.description: Creates a minimal ProjectConfig object for retrieving template info.

methods.name: make_path_absolute
methods.description: Converts a relative path to an absolute path based on a base path.

methods.name: template_init_info_to_dict
methods.description: Converts TemplateInitInfo object into a dictionary with absolute paths for JSON serialization.

methods.name: output_json
methods.description: Outputs a JSON-formatted result indicating success or failure, with optional template info.

methods.name: output_get_run_command
methods.description: Outputs the run command for a specific project type in JSON format.

methods.name: handle_get_run_command
methods.description: Handles the CLI operation to retrieve the run command for a given project type.

methods.name: main
methods.description: Main entry point for the CLI application, parsing arguments and executing commands accordingly.
